name: Master Suite IED Scan
description: Pilot a micro-UAV from an over-exposed bathroom through a dim bedroom and into a cluttered dressing room to locate a simulated IED, then exfiltrate.  Lighting shifts, a reflective marble table, an active ceiling fan, and densely packed furniture reproduce the orientation, sensor, and control problems called out in the forum discussion.  Checkpoints force the operator to steady up in the bedroom before squeezing past the final doorway into the dressing room where the target sits.
checkpoint_locationIds: by door of top big light room
endpoint_locationId: back of room of tight doorway room
